TopicTitle: Looking for crafts that i can showcase on my youtube channel!

Articles.Content:
Hello guys! My name is Maninatincan and I record KSP. http://www.youtube.com/user/Maninatincan

Many others do this so i'm making it fresh by showing off some crafts! And of course the only way to get them is through you guys,the community! So if you have a nice craft that you'd like me to showcase i'd be greatly thankful to use it! If you are not the creator of the craft can you be sure to give me their name so i can contact them.You can send the file to my email [email protected] Thanks and have a nice day!
If you like Space Planes... see my sig link image

I would like to suggest my mini-shuttle: the SpaceCycle

Craft file can be found in my company, but i'll mail it to you anyway
You are gonna be flooded so I won't add to the floodgate opening.

My craft files (at SpacePort) are not spectacular. However, to jazz up one of your own craft, try out my assortment of fueled adapters and nosecones. The rocket ones are colorful (and some translucent), while the jet ones are about as plain as the stock parts. See my sig line: one link is to a pic and the other is to the Port download page.
